channel.title: Staff - Lightwave
channel.description:
Hey guys, this model took me about an hour to make. It should be compatible with the RS client (Polys are tri's, not quads) All meshed in, accept the floating crystal thing. Handels a bit chunky, i know, v2 might take away the cyclinder shape and make it a sqaure instead.
Primitive modelling, still need to work on it a bit :D
970~ Polyes, might need reducing.
Pic:
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll245/mjownzu_07/staff.png[/img]
Download Link:
http://uppit.com/v/R453MV5Q (OBJ one)
http://uppit.com/v/IADZS6W3 (MTL, not really sure what it's used for, just decided to upload with it just incease.)
.obj should work with meta so you can then convert and put into ur client.
If you do use this, then please give creds
**NOT TEXTURED** Takes hours in lightwave, you'll have to do it yourself.

item.title: Staff - Lightwave
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:5, topic:327598”][quote author=The Arcanian link=topic=423983.msg3113845#msg3113845 date=1264797954]
I dont like the design.
[/quote]

Ok, cool, tell me how to make it better maybe?[/quote]Its his opinion on whether he simply likes it or not. If it’s just his opinion, no advice is really needed.

I, however, do like the design, but the pole should be scaled so it is skinnier, or else it just doesn’t look all too good.

Read full topic
